channel.title: VPS setup tutorial?
channel.description:
Hi, Just wondering if there was a tutorial on how to run a server from a VPS? Basically, i haven't played RSC in a long time, an have a VPS which i use for other things and wanted to throw up a copy something like emulation where my mates and i can play rsc. Could someone point me in the right direction?
domain name and dedicated ip address not a problem.
Regards, Chris.

item.title: VPS setup tutorial?
item.dc:creator: @martinfin martinfin
item.description:
@martinfin wrote:

[quote=“MubbY Inb4CorruptDavid, post:2, topic:411059”][quote author=zimbo link=topic=512327.msg3718387#msg3718387 date=1313787227]
Hi, Just wondering if there was a tutorial on how to run a server from a VPS?
Basically, i haven’t played RSC in a long time, an have a VPS which i use for other things and wanted to throw up a copy something like emulation where my mates and i can play rsc.
Could someone point me in the right direction?

domain name and dedicated ip address not a problem.

Regards,
Chris.
[/quote]
Just down EasyRSC[/quote]

Cuz He doesnt know…
